about_the_game:
Part 2 of the X series will take you to an island in the south on a honeymoon! Get married and pledge eternal love to your maids!
This expansion is compatible with the High Poly Body, allowing you to enjoy a resort vacation by the beautiful ocean with your even more beautiful maids.
Pledge your love at the altar, eat dinner at the hotel, sneak away to a secret cove… You can enjoy your honeymoon with your maid in a ton of different locations.


1. New Mode "Honeymoon Mode"
Leave the Empire Club behind and hold a wedding ceremony on a tropical island, and then enjoy a vacation for two with your favorite maid.
You can select a location from the map and choose an activity during the day and at night. There are all sorts of lovely locations to spend some quality time with your maid, ranging from the pier, to the beach, to the hotel.
 
2. "Honeymoon Yotogi"
Until now, in new yotogi modes, ADV scenes have been interspersed with specific yotogi skills for you to enjoy, but in Honeymoon Yotogi, you can select your preferred skill from a variety of different yotogi.
Now you can change the situation to suit your desires and enjoy doing whatever yotogi you like.
 
3. "NTR Honeymoon"
 
NTR events will appear during Honeymoon Yotogi.
In addition to Pure Love scenes, there are also plenty of H scenes featuring men other than the maids’ husband.
 
*After sleeping with another man as requested by her husband, the maid reports what she did…
*The maid happens across an orgy and ends up joining in… and more.
 
*NTR events will not appear if the NTR Block is turned ON.
 
4. Lots of new costumes!
There are 4 new costumes that are compatible with both the Normal Body and High Poly Body

2 costumes for the Female (High Poly Body only)
1 tuxedo or the Female (Normal Body only)
1 tuxedo for the Male (High Poly Body only)
2 male hairstyles (High Poly Body only)
 
Wedding Dress (Normal Body/High Poly Body)
Summer Dress (Normal Body/High Poly Body)
Wedding Lingerie (Normal Body/High Poly Body)
Tuxedo (Male High Poly Body only)
Tuxedo (Female Normal Body only)
Honeymoon Vacation Swimsuit (Normal Body/High Poly Body)
Workout Set (High Poly Body only)
New School Swimsuit (High Poly Body only)
Voluminous Wild (Male-only hair)
Wild Blow Bangs (Male-only hair)
 
Tons of fancy new costumes to wear on your honeymoon have been added.
If you play X1 with the High Poly Body-compatible COM3D2.5, you’ll be able to appreciate these new edit parts in higher fidelity graphics.
(*If you wish to enjoy the game with High Poly Body-exclusive content, COM3D2.5 is required.)

5. Fishing Minigame
You can play a new fishing minigame while in Honeymoon Mode.
Different events will play after you finish fishing depending on what type of fish you catch.
Catch delicious fish and cook them up with your lovely wife-maid.
 
6. My Room Customization Yotogi Compatibility
You can now use backgrounds you’ve created in My Room Customization mode when doing yotogi.

7. Change Yotogi Placement
You can now freely change the placement of characters during yotogi.
 
8. Backgrounds
5 new backgrounds have been added to Studio Mode!
Wedding Beach
Honeymoon Hotel
Showerhouse
Secret Cove
Seaside Cottage

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals 18 years of age or older.
It includes nudity, sex scene, and blatantly sexual imagery, as well as imagery that has sexual implications.
If you are not yet 18+ or if you are accessing from any country or located where adult material is specifically prohibited by law, do not play this game.

fullgame.name: CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic

name: CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2&2.5+X1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8.1/10 (All versions must be 64-bit.)
  • Processor: Core i5 Quad-core 2.5Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720 or higher, DirectX11 compatible GPU mid-range or above / GeForce GTX 560 or above OR Radeon R7 260X or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: [About GPU] Not guaranteed to work with Laptops, all in one desktops, and tablet PCs. Not guaranteed to work with Mobile GPU and IntelHD Series GPU. Does not correspond with RadeonHD Series GPU. Please install the latest Graphic Driver that is provided by your PC brand. [About VR device] In the case you playing in VR mode, please meet the minimum system requirements of your VR device. Please install the latest Runtime that is provided by HMD brand. [About Internet Environment] This product does not need internet connection to play, however, some contents will not be available offline. Not compatible with mobile Internet connection and tethering devices. [About OS] Not compatible with 32bitOS. Guaranteed to work only with the latest service pack. Please follow the warranty period of OS providers. Windows 7 has been announced that the warranty lasts until January, 2020.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8.1/10 (All versions must be 64-bit.)
  • Processor: Core i5 Quad-core 3Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080 or higher, GeForce GTX 760 or above mid-range to high-end
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

This expansion is compatible with the High Poly Body, allowing you to enjoy a resort vacation by the beautiful ocean with your even more beautiful maids.
